mapper.select: SELECT id, name, sex, tel, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,birthday,NOW()) AS age, date, status FROM tb_appointment WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_appointment SET uuid= #{uuid}, order_id = #{orderId}, date = #{date}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, pid = #{pid}, birthday = #{birthday}, tel = #{tel}, mailing_address = #{mailingAddress}, company = #{company}, status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_appointment SET `status` = 2, checkin_time = NOW() WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE() AND `status` = 1 AND pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.uuid, o.snapshot_id AS snapshotId FROM tb_appointment a JOIN tb_order o ON a.order_id = o.id WHERE a.date = CURRENT_DATE() AND a.pid = #{pid}

SELECT a.uuid, a.order_id AS orderId, o.snapshot_id AS snapshotId, a.name, a.sex, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,a.birthday, NOW()) AS age, a.pid, a.tel, a.date, a.company FROM tb_appointment a JOIN tb_order o ON a.order_id = o.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.`name`, a.sex, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, a.birthday, NOW()) AS age, a.tel, a.uuid, a.date, a.`status`, o.snapshot_id AS snapshotId FROM tb_appointment a JOIN tb_order o ON a.order_id = o.id WHERE a.uuid = #{uuid}
